Html:
I go this Error in my Bootstrapper

The non-generic method 'Microsoft.Practices.Unity.IUnityContainer.RegisterType(System.Type, System.Type, string, Microsoft.Practices.Unity.LifetimeManager, params Microsoft.Practices.Unity.InjectionMember[])' cannot be used with type arguments	

The weird is that i dont have the overloads options of this function.

Im using CompositeWPF-42969 - V4 Builds

What am i doing Wrong?

In Unity 2 many of the IUnityContainer methods have been moved out to be extension methods so you need to add the namespace 'Microsoft.Practices.Unity' in order to use them.  See this post for more info:

http://unity.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=199361
That Solves the problem. Thanks metaman.
